title: Husband fights demand for DNA in April Kauffman murder probe
itunes:title: Husband fights demand for DNA in April Kauffman murder probe
description:
April Kauffman’s husband has never been named a suspect in the New Jersey talk show host’s 2012 murder, but a prosecutor is now asking a judge to order Dr. James Kauffman to give a DNA sample. The husband’s lawyer is fighting the demand, but a judge will soon decide if he’ll have to give DNA. In this episode, Nancy Grace and Alan Duke discuss why this 5-year-old cold case is now heating up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
